name: Hexa Puzzle Fever
description:
This game starts out easily but gets challenging soon! With its over 700 levels, you will soon find yourself addicted to this challenge and pleasure!

FEATURES:
- Over 700 brain-bending block puzzle levels!
- Simple yet challenging!
- Beautiful backgrounds and artworks
- Pleasing and relaxing gameplay
- No wifi? You don’t need wifi! Hexa Puzzle Fever - Classic Block Puzzle is a game you can play anywhere, anytime!
- Play with your friends and family!

Have a good time in Hexa Puzzle Fever - Classic Block Puzzle!
